definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: Sahlberg: There's no evidence globally that doing more of the same [instructionally] will improve results.
sentences.chinese: 没有全球性的证据显示增加教学时间可以改善结果。

sentences.english: Although this follows a global trend, it can take some time.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这顺应了一场全球性的潮流，但它仍需要时间。

sentences.english: It is the result of global non-colonization movement to confirm the collective human rights.
sentences.chinese: 对集体人权的确认，是全球性非殖民化运动的结果。

sentences.english: Right now, Haier has a long way to go to become a global brand.
sentences.chinese: 要想成为一个全球性的品牌，海尔还有很长的路要走。

sentences.english: They say this will cause global problems that will destroy the world.
sentences.chinese: 他们称这会导致全球性的问题，从而毁掉整个世界。

sentences.english: AIDS has been an epidemic for years now across the globe.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病成为全球性流行性疾病已经很多年了。

sentences.english: Does the world need a global "Tobin" tax?
sentences.chinese: 世界是否需要一种全球性的“托宾税”？

sentences.english: Has Chateau Pichon Baron been affected by the global financial crisis recently?
sentences.chinese: 全球性的金融海啸对于碧尚男爵堡有何影响？

sentences.english: The global wholesale lending market is where big banks lend to one another.
sentences.chinese: 全球性贷款批发市场是大型银行彼此放贷的地方。

sentences.english: Affronting these global problems, people groan that is the increasing limit.
sentences.chinese: 面对这些全球性问题，人类发出“增长极限”的叹息。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic pollution has been becoming globally harmful to public society not to be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 电磁污染已经成为一种不容忽视的全球性社会公害。

sentences.english: The newbilization of white collar is a global trend.
sentences.chinese: 白领牛比化是个全球性的趋势。

sentences.english: Global studies have shown how quickly these bacteria can develop and spread.
sentences.chinese: 全球性的研究表明细菌的发展传播是如此快速。

sentences.english: This would be the first global contraction since since 1982.
sentences.chinese: 这将是1982年以来第一次全球性萎缩。

sentences.english: There is a worldwide overcapacity for wide steel strip.
sentences.chinese: 目前是一个全球性过剩的广泛带钢。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
all over the world/everywhere/in all parts of the world
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
